oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: True Love Is Greater Than Friendship - Johnny Cash performance - 1970
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of True Love Is Greater Than Friendship, as performed by Johnny Cash and Carl Perkins. Featured on the soundtrack for the movie "Little Fauss And Big Halsy," released in 1970.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Cash; Carl Perkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Johnny Cash and Carl Perkins perform "True Love Is Greater Than Friendship"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Demo pitch letter addressed from John E. Denny [typed] and "True Love Is Greater Than Friendship" sheet music [typed] stored with transcription documents; Box 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cedarwood Publishing Company; Denny, John E.; Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998;
